listing.name: Dove Winds Apartments
listing.description: Our two-story apartments include two separate bedrooms, 1.5 baths and a full kitchen. Downstairs you will find a comfortable living area with a futon, a kitchen area with refrigerator, full size range, microwave, and dining table, and a full bathroom with a shower. Upstairs includes two bedrooms with queen size beds and a half bathroom. There is a deck and a seasonal indoor heated pool. Laundry facilities are available on the premises. The location is ideal, just 1/4 mile from the entrance to the Chincoteague National Wildlife Refuge and only minutes from the beach. The maximum occupancy for our apartments is two people. $850 per month, plus electric. Includes basic cable, basic internet, and water. Contact 757-336-5667 for a rental application. No smoking.
